int parseGPS ( char *  buf,
double &  lat,
double &  lng,
double &  heading,
double &  speed 
)

A handwritten parser for various GPS output protocols, allowing for arbitrary mid-line breaks. The latitude, longitude, heading, and speed info will be extracted from the lines in the buffer.

Parameters:
bufThe buffer contains GPS info from the sensor.
